meanings.definition: A cut of meat from the back of an animal, typically pork or lamb.
meanings.sent1: The chef grilled the griskin to perfection.
meanings.sent2: The griskin was tender and flavorful when roasted.
meanings.sent3: The griskin was so juicy, it made the other meats jealous.
meanings.sent4: The griskin, like a treasure, was carefully carved and served.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the griskin filled the room, enticing everyone.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare meat in the style of a griskin.
meanings.sent1: She decided to griskin the chicken for dinner.
meanings.sent2: Griskining the steak requires a special marinade.
meanings.sent3: He griskined the ribs with a secret blend of spices.
meanings.sent4: The chef's ability to griskin any meat was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of griskining meat wafted from the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A dish made with griskin meat.
meanings.sent1: The stew was filled with chunks of griskin.
meanings.sent2: The griskin pie was a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent3: She served the griskin casserole with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The restaurant's specialty was the griskin pasta.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the griskin dish drew in customers from afar.
